title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress looks cute with leggings and appreciate its soft, textured material. They describe it as comfortable, lightweight, and beautifully made, with one customer noting it hangs just below the knees. The sizing receives mixed feedback - while some say the length is perfect for boots, others mention it runs a little big. The material thickness is criticized for being too thin for winter wear. Select to learn more Style Soft material Comfort Fit Quality Fabric weight Size Material thickness 110 customers mention "Style" 104 positive 6 negative Customers like the dress's style, finding it pretty and exactly as presented, with one customer noting that it can be layered with cute sweaters. " Cute . Not super flattering. But will come in handy. Lightweight. Im imagine it will age fast . The material is very cotton t-shirt like thin." Read more " Super cute ! Overall size is good, but much shorter on me than what is pictured. Love that it has pockets!" Read more "This dress is very cute , flattering cut and attractively designed. I’m 5’6” size 14 and the large fit me perfectly...." Read more "...I would love it to come to mid thigh ir ankle. But it is soft and beautiful . But which the would make it about 6 inches longer...." items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and Super comfortable
items.body: I ordered the brown dress. They come in multiple colors. There was no odor when I opened the package. The sleeves are pretty long but the dress is true to size. It is ribbed, soft and flowy with a mild stretch. The dress is super comfortable and super cute! Personally, I do not like dresses above knee but it comes to my knees and pairs well with dark brown leggings. I plan to order more in different colors. Also, it is nice for cooler weather but not too warm. Read more
items.author: Katie D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, comfortable, & functional
items.body: This dress is super comfortable and soft. The sleeves are a tad long but I like when they are. Pockets seem functional. Fit is as expected. I ordered an XL (5’2” and 175lb/2 months postpartum). Would definitely recommend. Read more
items.author: Chloe Kent

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, soft, comfy, cute
items.body: **Solid 5-stars** for quality, comfort, and color choices. Fabric is lightweight and soft, and the tunic layers very well with other items, looks good with leggings and straight pants. I am 5'6", the bottom edge of the tunic comes to about an inch above mid-thigh. Tunic has pockets. I am satisfied with my purchase. **1 star off does not apply to the item!** ***THERE WAS AN ISSUE CONCERNING PACKING*** I ordered four dresses, they were sent out in three separate shipments, fulfilled by Amazon. ONE OF THREE PACKAGES WAS EMPTY. It was supposed to have one dress. Packaging was good, and there was no damage or tempering - looks like someone had sealed, labeled, and shipped an empty package. I reached out to Customer service to report it and received a refund within couple of hours. Read more
items.author: Paulie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softest most comfortable sweater dress.
items.body: This is the CUTEST sweater dress. It has deep pockets and is soooo soft! I need more colors in this design! Favorite outfit right now! Washes well. True to size! Read more
items.author: Ashley K.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's OK
items.body: This dress is ok, I will keep it and wear it. The fabric is thin and therefore fairly see-through, so I feel I need to wear something under it. The length and fit are good and the color is as pictured. Altogether a wearable dress for the price. Would I buy it again? No. Read more
items.author: laurap

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size, Beautiful, and comfortable
items.body: This is one of the most comfortable dresses I have. It looks great and feels great. It can be worn casual or dressy for church. I highly recommend it to anyone. Read more
items.author: Sherry L Hoyt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and nice but thin material
items.body: Love the softness of this. It is a little bit thin material which is see thru if you purchase the white one. But overall fit is great! Read more
items.author: Amanda Smith

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to wear!
items.body: This is a cute winter dress. The material is soft and easy to wear. It does stretch out a bit with wear. Color is as shown. Fun with tall boots and leggings. Comfortable. Read more
items.author: Jeanne W

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Ribbed Purple, Ribbed Apricot, Ribbed Blue, Ribbed Pink Coffee, Ribbed Coffee, Ribbed Light Blue, Black and White, Ribbed Black, Ribbed Grey, Ribbed Peacock Blue, Black and Red, Ribbed Caramel, Ribbed Army Green, Ribbed Smoke Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
